Title: Microsoft Teams: Channel Agent
Description:
Channel agent works alongside you and your team to help you manage projects. It can create status reports, send emails, schedule meetings, co-author documents, and answer questions. Channel agent understands context from meetings, chats, and files, and uses that knowledge to help you move work forward. Itâ€™s designed to save time, reduce manual effort, and make collaboration more intelligent.
GA date: September CY2026
